name: Financial Director
tag_list: finance, business-news, financial-news, business, corporate-finance, business-recovery-and-consultancy, finance-directors, finance-controllers, chief-executives, managing-directors, chief-financial-officers, the-budget
overview:
Financial Director is dedicated to the information needs of financial directors and is also a monthly magazine.

The content provides invaluable insights, informative reader surveys and exclusive interviews that help FDs meet the challenges they face.

From corporate finance to corporate governance, IT strategy to FD careers, as well as emerging legislation, technology and professional best practice, Financial Director provides FDs with the knowledge they need for their next board meeting.
